name: Top Billiards
description: "Top billiards" is an online billiards competition game, which supports playing with friends or strangers. In the first issue, we only launch 8-Ball mode for the time being, and 9-Ball mode and snooker mode will be launched in the later period. And in the general mode of innovation and update play. In the current version, the game is divided into different levels, and players can play according to their own abilities. We implement and ensure the fairness of the game. We will not add props that can change any property in the game, but only provide props that change the appearance. Therefore, it basically depends on your ability and luck.
